notes:
## Mod Update: ReplayInputView++
[Improved ReplayInputView by Fishuwako](https://github.com/jyanf/ReplayInputView--)
### F4 hitbox show function
- No more fake hitbox
- Inactive hitbox will fade into hollow red box
- Able to show bullet and entity's hurtbox (green for bullet collision, blue for entity)
- Able to drop inner box line, only outer border line 
- Special box has unique color (invul, armor, parry, grab, reflect, gap, guarding)
### F6 Debug info panel
- Awesome GUI info side-window with brief instruction
- Mouse can hover and click
### F7 input show function
- Will refresh history every match
- Input history gradually fades
- The newly pressed key will have a reverse color effect, eye-catching when mashing
### Misc
- All support Story and Arcade mode
- Hit counting will always show even though game paused
- Hotkey, color, functions are configurable in *ReplayInputView++.ini*
### Hotkeys
- F4 hitbox, F6 info, F7 input, F9 slower, F10 faster, F11 pause, F12 step
